alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 12:58PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade County through 130 PM EDT... At 1258 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sunset, or over Kendall, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miami, Coral Gables, South Miami, Kendall, The Redland, Doral, Pinecrest, Sweetwater, West Miami, Westchester, Glenvar Heights, Richmond West, Fountainbleau, Richmond Heights, Country Walk, Kendale Lakes, Palmetto Bay, Cutler Bay, University Of Miami and Zoo Miami. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
